ability.name: Infernal Chains
ability.description: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.

ability.name: Spirit Rush
ability.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.

ability.name: Shuriken Flip
ability.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

Akshan.name: Akshan
Akshan.title: the Rogue Sentinel
Akshan.quote: "Fixing the world, one scoundrel at a time!"

ability.name: Comeuppance
ability.description: Akshan locks onto an enemy champion and starts storing bullets. When released, he fires all stored bullets, dealing damage based on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit.

ability.name: Unbreakable Will
ability.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

ability.name: Lacerate
ability.description: Ambessa whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating Drakehound's Step from this ability causes her to strike a second time at the end of its dash.

ability.name: Bandage Toss
ability.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

ability.name: Flash Frost
ability.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.

Annie.name: Annie
Annie.title: the Dark Child
Annie.quote: "You wanna play too? It'll be fun!"

ability.name: Molten Shield
ability.description: Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells.

ability.name: Phase
ability.description: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability.

ability.name: Hawkshot
ability.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.

Aurelion Sol.name: Aurelion Sol
Aurelion Sol.title: The Star Forger
Aurelion Sol.quote: "In a constantly shifting cosmos, a world this static is... refreshing."

ability.name: Astral Flight
ability.description:
Aurelion Sol flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying.

Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by Aurelion Sol.

Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range.

ability.name: Between Worlds
ability.description: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, releasing a shockwave that damages and slows any enemies it hits. Afterward, she creates an area that traps enemies within it and allows Aurora to teleport from one side of the area to the other.

ability.name: Conquering Sands
ability.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.

Bard.name: Bard
Bard.title: the Wandering Caretaker
Bard.quote: Bard lets a  Meep onto his shoulder and lets it run to and fro across his arms.

ability.name: Magical Journey
ability.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.

Bel'Veth.name: Bel'Veth
Bel'Veth.title: the Empress of the Void
Bel'Veth.quote: "I am the voice of the silence."

ability.name: Endless Banquet
ability.description: Bel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat move speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora.

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.description: Blitzcrank fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.

Brand.name: Brand
Brand.title: the Burning Vengeance
Brand.quote: "Ready to set the world on fire? Heheheh..."

ability.name: Pillar of Flame
ability.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.

ability.name: Stand Behind Me
ability.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.

Briar.name: Briar
Briar.title: the Restrained Hunger
Briar.quote: "Nice to meet you! I'm hungry. I mean... Briar!"

ability.name: Chilling Scream
ability.description: Briar refocuses her mind, removing Blood Frenzy and channeling energy into a powerful scream that damages and slows enemies. While charging, she takes reduced damage and heals for a portion of her max Health. A fully charged scream knocks foes back, dealing additional damage and stunning those who collide with a wall.

Caitlyn.name: Caitlyn
Caitlyn.title: the Sheriff of Piltover
Caitlyn.quote: "Shall I turn in my badge and rifle as well?"

ability.name: 90 Caliber Net
ability.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.

Camille.name: Camille
Camille.title: the Steel Shadow
Camille.quote: "Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon."

ability.name: Precision Protocol
ability.description: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

ability.name: Petrifying Gaze
ability.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

Cho'Gath.name: Cho'Gath
Cho'Gath.title: the Terror of the Void
Cho'Gath.quote: "You'd wish the world you know to end! Yeeeesssss..."

ability.name: Feast
ability.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.

Corki.name: Corki
Corki.title: the Daring Bombardier
Corki.quote: "I'm up to snuff, and gots me an ace machine!"

ability.name: Phosphorus Bomb
ability.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions and large monsters hit by the blade.

ability.name: Moonfall
ability.description:
Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them.

If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled.

ability.name: Whirling Death
ability.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction. Executes enemies who have less health than Draven's number of Adoration stacks.

ability.name: Blunt Force Trauma
ability.description:
Passive - Dr. Mundo gains bonus Attack Damage, increasing based on his max Health.

Active - Dr. Mundo slams his â€œmedicalâ€ bag into an enemy, dealing additional damage based on his missing Health. If the enemy dies they are swatted away, dealing damage to enemies they pass through.

Ekko.name: Ekko
Ekko.title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
Ekko.quote: "It's not how much time you have, it's how you use it."

ability.name: Phase Dive
ability.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.

Elise.name: Elise
Elise.title: the Spider Queen
Elise.quote: "Only the spider is safe in her web."

ability.name: Spider Form
ability.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

ability.name: Allure
ability.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

ability.name: Arcane Shift
ability.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.

Fiddlesticks.name: Fiddlesticks
Fiddlesticks.title: the Ancient Fear
Fiddlesticks.quote: A stripped-down version of Star Guardian 2022's orchestral theme plays.

ability.name: Crowstorm
ability.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

ability.name: Riposte
ability.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

ability.name: Playful / Trickster
ability.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

ability.name: Winds of War
ability.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.

Gangplank.name: Gangplank
Gangplank.title: the Saltwater Scourge
Gangplank.quote: "Neither the flames nor the depths could claim me."

ability.name: Remove Scurvy
ability.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

Garen.name: Garen
Garen.title: The Might of Demacia
Garen.quote: "My heart and sword always for Demacia."

ability.name: Demacian Justice
ability.description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.

Gnar.name: Gnar
Gnar.title: the Missing Link
Gnar.quote: Gnar drops upside down and playfully flaunts the skull he carries around.

ability.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
ability.description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

ability.name: Explosive Cask
ability.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.

ability.name: Smoke Screen
ability.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their Move Speed reduced briefly.

ability.name: Skip 'n Slash
ability.description: Gwen dashes a short distance then gains Attack Speed, attack range, and magic damage <OnHit>On-Hit</OnHit> for a few seconds. If she hits an enemy during that time, this Ability's cooldown is partially refunded.

Hecarim.name: Hecarim
Hecarim.title: the Shadow of War
Hecarim.quote: "Behold, the might of the Shadow Isles."

ability.name: Onslaught of Shadows
ability.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

ability.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
ability.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

Hwei.name: Hwei
Hwei.title: the Visionary
Hwei.quote: "A painter meets their subject eye to eye."

ability.name: Spiraling Despair
ability.description: Hwei paints a vision of pure despair. The first enemy champion struck becomes the center of an expanding painting that slows and damages nearby enemies. The vision explodes after reaching its maximum size or when the champion dies.

Illaoi.name: Illaoi
Illaoi.title: the Kraken Priestess
Illaoi.quote: "I'm not big on sermonsâ€”broken bones teach better lessons."

ability.name: Tentacle Smash
ability.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

ability.name: Defiant Dance
ability.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.

ability.name: Brushmaker
ability.description: In brush, Ivern and his nearby allies attacks deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

ability.name: Eye Of The Storm
ability.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.

Jarvan IV.name: Jarvan IV
Jarvan IV.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
Jarvan IV.quote: "By my will, this shall be finished."

ability.name: Dragon Strike
ability.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

Jax.name: Jax
Jax.title: Grandmaster at Arms
Jax.quote: Jax yawns. "Looks like I'll be carrying more than my own weight today."

ability.name: Leap Strike
ability.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

ability.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
ability.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Move Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.

Jhin.name: Jhin
Jhin.title: the Virtuoso
Jhin.quote: "In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."

ability.name: Curtain Call
ability.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

Jinx.name: Jinx
Jinx.title: the Loose Cannon
Jinx.quote: "Rules are made to be broken... like buildings! Or people!"

ability.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
ability.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.

Kai'Sa.name: Kai'Sa
Kai'Sa.title: Daughter of the Void
Kai'Sa.quote: "Are you the hunter... or the prey?"

ability.name: Void Seeker
ability.description:
Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.

Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.

ability.name: Rend
ability.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

ability.name: Inspire
ability.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

Karthus.name: Karthus
Karthus.title: the Deathsinger
Karthus.quote: "Agony, ecstasy, peace. Every passing has a beauty all its own."

ability.name: Wall of Pain
ability.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Move Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.

Kassadin.name: Kassadin
Kassadin.title: the Void Walker
Kassadin.quote: "The balance of power must be preserved."

ability.name: Force Pulse
ability.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

ability.name: Preparation
ability.description: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.

ability.name: Divine Judgment
ability.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.

ability.name: Umbral Trespass
ability.description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

ability.name: Electrical Surge
ability.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

ability.name: Void Assault
ability.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, Void Assault gains increased <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisibility</font> duration, and an additional use.

ability.name: Mounting Dread
ability.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

Kled.name: Kled
Kled.title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
Kled.quote: "I find courage unpredictable. It's total insanity you can rely on!"

ability.name: Violent Tendencies
ability.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

ability.name: Living Artillery
ability.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

K'Sante.name: K'Sante
K'Sante.title: the Pride of Nazumah
K'Sante.quote: "Better to fight, than to live in fear."

ability.name: All Out
ability.description: K'Sante knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, K'Sante goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses.

LeBlanc.name: LeBlanc
LeBlanc.title: the Deceiver
LeBlanc.quote: "The Black Rose shall bloom once more."

ability.name: Distortion
ability.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

ability.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
ability.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

ability.name: Solar Flare
ability.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.

ability.name: Blooming Blows
ability.description: Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

Lissandra.name: Lissandra
Lissandra.title: the Ice Witch
Lissandra.quote: "I will bury the world in ice."

ability.name: Frozen Tomb
ability.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Move Speed.

Lucian.name: Lucian
Lucian.title: the Purifier
Lucian.quote: "Everybody dies. Some just need a little help."

ability.name: Piercing Light
ability.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

ability.name: Help, Pix!
ability.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

Lux.name: Lux
Lux.title: the Lady of Luminosity
Lux.quote: "But all my light puns would've brightened your day."

ability.name: Prismatic Barrier
ability.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

Malphite.name: Malphite
Malphite.title: Shard of the Monolith
Malphite.quote: "I'm moving as fast as I can."

ability.name: Thunderclap
ability.description: Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.

ability.name: Call of the Void
ability.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.

ability.name: Sapling Toss
ability.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

ability.name: Wuju Style
ability.description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.

Milio.name: Milio
Milio.title: The Gentle Flame
Milio.quote: "Stick with me! I'll keep you warm." Fuemigo cheers.

ability.name: Warm Hugs
ability.description: Milio tosses a shield to an ally, temporarily increasing their movement speed. This ability has 2 charges.

ability.name: Strut
ability.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Move Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

ability.name: Cyclone
ability.description:
Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed.

Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.

ability.name: Death's Grasp
ability.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.

Morgana.name: Morgana
Morgana.title: the Fallen
Morgana.quote: "I am bound, but I will not break."

ability.name: Black Shield
ability.description: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.

Naafiri.name: Naafiri
Naafiri.title: the Hound of a Hundred Bites

ability.name: Eviscerate
ability.description: Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.

Nami.name: Nami
Nami.title: the Tidecaller
Nami.quote: "I decide what the tide will bring."

ability.name: Tidal Wave
ability.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

Nasus.name: Nasus
Nasus.title: the Curator of the Sands
Nasus.quote: "The cycle of life and death continues,we will live,they will die."

ability.name: Wither
ability.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Move Speed and Attack Speed over time.

ability.name: Depth Charge
ability.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

ability.name: Pop Blossom
ability.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and knocked up. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

ability.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
ability.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

ability.name: Slipstream
ability.description: Nilah enthusiastically dashes toward her target, dealing damage to any enemies she passes through on the way.

ability.name: Shroud of Darkness
ability.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.

ability.name: Consume
ability.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.

ability.name: Tough It Out
ability.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased and he gains a Shield.

Orianna.name: Orianna
Orianna.title: the Lady of Clockwork
Orianna.quote: "We will kill your enemies. That will be fun."

ability.name: Command: Attack
ability.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

Ornn.name: Ornn
Ornn.title: The Fire below the Mountain
Ornn.quote: "I have fur. It is soft. Do not hug me."

ability.name: Volcanic Rupture
ability.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

ability.name: Grand Starfall
ability.description: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.

Poppy.name: Poppy
Poppy.title: Keeper of the Hammer
Poppy.quote: "I'm no heroâ€”just a Yordle with a hammer."

ability.name: Steadfast Presence
ability.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded.

ability.name: Bone Skewer
ability.description: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

ability.name: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
ability.description: Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.

ability.name: Heightened Senses
ability.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Move Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

ability.name: Gleaming Quill
ability.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

Rammus.name: Rammus
Rammus.title: the Armordillo
Rammus.quote: The voice-over for  Durian Defender Rammus is not available as unique set of audio files (the audio is directly pitched in-game from the base voice-over by the audio engine).

ability.name: Defensive Ball Curl
ability.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him.

ability.name: Void Rush
ability.description: Rek'Sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their missing health.

Rell.name: Rell
Rell.title: the Iron Maiden
Rell.quote: "Nothing gets in, no one gets out."

ability.name: Ferromancy: Crash Down
ability.description:
Mounted: Rell Dismounts, crashing down in her armor, Knocking enemies up and gaining a large Shield. While dismounted, she gains Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range, but is Slowed.

Dismounted: Rell forms her Mount, gaining a burst of speed and Knocking Up the next enemy she attacks.

Renata Glasc.name: Renata Glasc
Renata Glasc.title: the Chem-Baroness
Renata Glasc.quote: "It's 'Miss Glasc'... if you value your life."

ability.name: Handshake
ability.description: Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.

ability.name: Slice and Dice
ability.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

ability.name: Savagery
ability.description:
Rengar's next Attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

ability.name: Valor
ability.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

ability.name: Flamespitter
ability.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

ability.name: Realm Warp
ability.description:
Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.

On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

ability.name: Inferno Trigger
ability.description: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her.

ability.name: Glacial Prison
ability.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

Senna.name: Senna
Senna.title: the Redeemer
Senna.quote: "No one fights alone in the Mist."

ability.name: Dawning Shadow
ability.description: Senna calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center.

ability.name: Surround Sound
ability.description: Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.

Sett.name: Sett
Sett.title: the Boss
Sett.quote: "'Ey, never pick a fight you can't win."

ability.name: Haymaker
ability.description: Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. On cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides.

ability.name: Hallucinate
ability.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: Shadow Dash
ability.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

ability.name: Flame Breath
ability.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

ability.name: Mega Adhesive
ability.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

ability.name: Decimating Smash
ability.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

Sivir.name: Sivir
Sivir.title: the Battle Mistress
Sivir.quote: "I always take my toll; blood, or gold."

ability.name: Ricochet
ability.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks gain additional attack speed and bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage while bouncing.

Skarner.name: Skarner
Skarner.title: the Primordial Sovereign
Skarner.quote: "I am the vanguard of Ixtal's protection."

ability.name: Seismic Bastion
ability.description: Skarner gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes.

Smolder.name: Smolder
Smolder.title: the Fiery Fledgling
Smolder.quote: "I heard that the royal family of Camaroar used to offer rings to my ancestors. Ha, those things must've been humongous."

ability.name: Achooo!
ability.description: Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.

ability.name: Hymn of Valor
ability.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

ability.name: Starcall
ability.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.

ability.name: Nevermove
ability.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. Swain can then choose to pull all rooted champions closer. This ability has a shorter cooldown during Demonic Ascension.

ability.name: Kingslayer
ability.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

ability.name: Unleashed Power
ability.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

Tahm Kench.name: Tahm Kench
Tahm Kench.title: The River King
Tahm Kench.quote: "Call me king, call me demon. Water forgets the names of the drowned."

ability.name: Thick Skin
ability.description:
Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat.

Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield.

ability.name: Seismic Shove
ability.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.

ability.name: Rake
ability.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

Taric.name: Taric
Taric.title: the Shield of Valoran
Taric.quote: "That glimmer of hope you see, that's me."

ability.name: Starlight's Touch
ability.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

ability.name: Move Quick
ability.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Move Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Move Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

ability.name: Death Sentence
ability.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

Tristana.name: Tristana
Tristana.title: the Yordle Gunner
Tristana.quote: "Once a Bandle gunner, always a Bandle gunner!"

ability.name: Buster Shot
ability.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

Trundle.name: Trundle
Trundle.title: the Troll King
Trundle.quote: "I'm troll judge, troll jury, and execu... troll!"

ability.name: Pillar of Ice
ability.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

ability.name: Bloodlust
ability.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

ability.name: Pick a Card
ability.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

Twitch.name: Twitch
Twitch.title: the Plague Rat
Twitch.quote: "What doesn't kill you just isn't finished yet."

ability.name: Venom Cask
ability.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

ability.name: Wingborne Storm
ability.description: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage.

Urgot.name: Urgot
Urgot.title: the Dreadnought
Urgot.quote: "You cannot know strength... Until you are broken."

ability.name: Fear Beyond Death
ability.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

ability.name: Piercing Arrow
ability.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

Vayne.name: Vayne
Vayne.title: the Night Hunter
Vayne.quote: "Let us hunt those who have fallen to darkness."

ability.name: Silver Bolts
ability.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.

ability.name: Event Horizon
ability.description: Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.

ability.name: Void Rift
ability.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

ability.name: Mistral Bolt
ability.description: Launch a damaging missile that accelerates mid-flight.

ability.name: Vault Breaker
ability.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

ability.name: Spectral Maw
ability.description: Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit.

ability.name: Gravity Field
ability.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Viktor's non-periodic spells apply a slow to enemies.

ability.name: Sanguine Pool
ability.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

ability.name: Frenzied Maul
ability.description: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them.  Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear.

ability.name: Jaws of the Beast
ability.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

Xayah.name: Xayah
Xayah.title: the Rebel
Xayah.quote: "I can never resist an invitation to dance."

ability.name: Featherstorm
ability.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

ability.name: Arcanopulse
ability.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

ability.name: Three Talon Strike
ability.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

Yasuo.name: Yasuo
Yasuo.title: the Unforgiven
Yasuo.quote: "Death is like the windâ€”always by my side."

ability.name: Last Breath
ability.description:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.

ability.name: Fate Sealed
ability.description: Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him.

Yorick.name: Yorick
Yorick.title: Shepherd of Souls
Yorick.quote: "Fear not... I will make use of your corpse."

ability.name: Dark Procession
ability.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

ability.name: Prowling Projectile
ability.description:
Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage and slowing first target hit. It deals bonus damage and an enchanced slow if it takes at least 1.35 seconds to get to its target. While on her Best Friend, the slow is always enhanced and grants bonus On-Hit damage to her ally.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor for a brief period.

ability.name: Unstable Matter
ability.description: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.

ability.name: Living Shadow
ability.description:
Passive: Zed gains energy whenever he and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for a few seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

ability.name: Ultrashock Laser
ability.description: Zeri fires an electric pulse that slows and damages the first enemy hit. If the pulse hits a wall it expands into a long range laser.

ability.name: Bouncing Bomb
ability.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

ability.name: Rewind
ability.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.

ability.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
ability.description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. While asleep, the target's Magic Resist is reduced. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

ability.name: Deadly Spines
ability.description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
